channel.title: I need help logging into private server!
channel.description:
Ok...Im in the log in screen with the two cars as the background. I click on "Enter" and I typed in my username and password. I dont have a private surver, so I putted in "King_Jon" as my user, and a password. It says"
Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own.
So I did. After I clicked "Start Server" , it says:
The server has not started. Im order to run the server from this button, you must start MoparScape using the batch file.
How do I do that? Please help me, Im confused :confused: I want a private server. [br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 01:35:32 AM[/size][hr]Please someone help!

item.title: I need help logging into private server!

i nee dhelp to i cant start a new surver[br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 10:38:23 PM[/size][hr]im ceep trying to start surver it says typ and user and pass i do that and it just says error coneccting to surver click " cancel" then “start surver” of ur own

Read full topic

item.title: I need help logging into private server!
item.dc:creator: @G_M0n3y G M0n3y
item.description:
@G_M0n3y wrote:

Well all I can suggest is…

  • Download the PROPER MoparScape Cache.
  • Select new server and set it to 127.0.0.1
  • Then try to log in.
  • If that does not work, go to “Start Server” as prompted.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help logging into private server!

item.title: I need help logging into private server!
item.dc:creator: @Jojaji Jojaji
item.description:
@Jojaji wrote:

Ok…Im in the log in screen with the two cars as the background. I click on “Enter” and I typed in my username and password. I dont have a private surver, so I putted in “King_Jon” as my user, and a password. It says"

Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own.

So I did. After I clicked “Start Server” , it says:

The server has not started. Im order to run the server from this button, you must start MoparScape using the batch file.

How do I do that? Please help me, Im confused I want a private server.
[br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 01:35:32 AM[/size][hr]Please someone help!
